CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With deep understanding of efficient photoinduced electron transfer within an interpenetrating network by simple blending π-conjugated polymers ( electron donor ) with fullerene derivatives ( electron acceptor ) , 1 bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) based on poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) : [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) have been extensively investigated , leading to great progress in power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) of 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT) |
| [6,6]-phenyl C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

Note: The entities in the paragraph are correctly formatted as Markdown code.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material Name" presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |
